snippet.title: Herdling - Official Gameplay Trailer | ID@Xbox
snippet.description:
Step into the world of Herdling in this gameplay trailer for the upcoming adventure game. Guide a herd of mysterious creatures on a stirring and beautiful journey into the mountains… and beyond. 

Herdling will be available on PC and Xbox in summer 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
